channel.title: 562 server help MAY PAY! PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
I got a 562 Server Called
Mast3r PkyZ client and i need help please,
I am pretty sure Build and Compile are the same thing (Please correct me and tell me the difference if they are NOT)
This client i am trying to edit and when i try to Build (compile) it gives me this error:
'javac' is not recognized as internal or external command, operable program or batch file Press any Key to continue . . .
Although, i had a server earlier today and i could compile just fine..?
So i went to EDIT on Build.bat to try to find the problem.. and its weird because usually my compile.bat in my servers say the path to my java or whatever and this one says:
@echo off Javac -cp ./bin/ ./src/*.java pause
So yeah, if anyone could be kind enough to help, i would REALLY appreciate it Or if you may want to pay.. you could try adding me on MSN Which is N3wdivide@yahoo.com
Sincerely, Lifez Joke

item.source: 562 server help MAY PAY! PLEASE HELP

item.title: 562 server help MAY PAY! PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“lifezjoke, post:3, topic:392985”]What do you mean …? i dont get what ur trying to get me to do to make it work

what do u want me to do?[/quote]

  1. Help is free. You can’t pay anyone for anything.
    2.[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:392985”][b]
  2. It’s javac, not Javac
  3. Chances are you could compile the server because it uses “C:\path\to\javac.exe”
  4. You should change your PATH variable to include the java executables.[/b][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: 562 server help MAY PAY! PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“lifezjoke, post:1, topic:392985”]I got a 562 Server Called

Mast3r PkyZ client and i need help please,

I am pretty sure Build and Compile are the same thing (Please correct me and tell me the difference if they are NOT)

This client i am trying to edit and when i try to Build (compile) it gives me this error:

‘javac’ is not recognized as internal or external command,
operable program or batch file
Press any Key to continue . . .

Although, i had a server earlier today and i could compile just fine…?

So i went to EDIT on Build.bat to try to find the problem… and its weird because usually my compile.bat in my servers say the path to my java or whatever and this one says:

@echo off
Javac -cp ./bin/ ./src/*.java
pause

So yeah, if anyone could be kind enough to help, i would REALLY appreciate it

Sincerely, Lifez Joke[/quote]

  1. It’s javac, not Javac
  2. Chances are you could compile the server because it uses “C:\path\to\javac.exe”
  3. You should change your PATH variable to include the java executables.

Read full topic
